articles.title: Canada's Denis Shapovalov, Vasek Pospisil into second round at U.S. Open
articles.description: NEW YORK — Canada's Denis Shapovalov cruised into the second round of men's singles competition at the U.S. Open with a 6-2, 6-2, 6-3 win over Argentina's Federico Delbonis on Tuesday. The seventh seed from Richmond Hill, Ont.

articles.title: In Argentina, giant rodents vie with the rich for top real estate
articles.description: Families of a giant rodent native to South America have been invading a luxury gated community in Argentina, highlighting the country's controversial environmental and social policies.
articles.content:
Aerial view of luxury gated communities built on wetlands from the Parana river in Argentina

articles.title: Canada’s Denis Shapovalov cruises into second round at U.S. Open
articles.description: Canadian Denis Shapovalov wins first-round match at U.S. Open over Argentina’s Federico Delbonis in straight sets
articles.content: Open this photo in gallery Canadian Denis Shapovalov reacts after scoring a point against Federico Delbonis, of Argentina, during the first round of the U.S. Open tennis championships on Aug. 31, 2021, in New York. John Minchillo/The Associated Press... [849 chars]
